clearcontrol.core.variable

Class VariableBase<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.variable.VariableBase<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - reference type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Variable, VariableBundle

    public abstract class VariableBase<O>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for variables.
    Author:
    royer

      • waitForSameAs

        public boolean waitForSameAs(O pValueToWaitFor,
                             long pTimeOut,
                             java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pTimeUnit)
        Waits for the _exact_ object reference to be set to this variable. This is rarely useful and it's often safer to use instead waitForEqualsTo(...). This method does not poll, and therefore is the best way to wait for events. (no CPU hogging)
        Parameters:
        pValueToWaitFor - value to wait for
        pTimeOut - timeout
        pTimeUnit - timeout unit
        Returns:
        true -> success

      • waitForEqualsTo

        public boolean waitForEqualsTo(O pValueToWaitFor,
                               long pTimeOut,
                               java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pTimeUnit)
        Waits for the an object that equals the given object. This method does not poll, and therefore is the best way to wait for events. (no CPU hogging)
        Parameters:
        pValueToWaitFor - value to wait for
        pTimeOut - timeout
        pTimeUnit - timeout unit
        Returns:
        true -> success

      • waitForEdge

        public boolean waitForEdge(O pNewValueToWaitFor,
                           long pTimeOut,
                           java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pTimeUnit)
        Waits for the an object that equals the given object. This method does not poll, and therefore is the best way to wait for events. (no CPU hogging)
        Parameters:
        pNewValueToWaitFor - value to wait for
        pTimeOut - timeout
        pTimeUnit - timeout unit
        Returns:
        true -> success
